languages.text: {n}И без того суровые Арбитес от ваших слов наполняются почти осязаемой угрозой. Проктор бьет себя кулаком в грудь:{/n} "Напутствие от опытного {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}комиссара{/d} — это именно то, что нужно. Клянусь Лексом, мы не подведем вас!"

{n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"
languages.original_text: {n}И без того суровые Арбитес от ваших слов наполняются почти осязаемой угрозой. Проктор бьет себя кулаком в грудь:{/n} "Напутствие от опытного {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}комиссара{/d} — это именно то, что нужно. Клянусь Лексом, мы не подведем вас!"

traits.locale_text: {n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

{n}The Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable before, at your words begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

{n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

{n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

{n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

{n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

languages.text: {n}Bei deinen Worten strahlen die Arbitratoren, die bereits eine beträchtliche Präsenz hatten, noch mehr Gefahr aus. Der Proktor schlägt sich mit seiner Faust gegen die Brust.{/n} "Eine Ansprache von einem erfahrenen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Kommissar{/d} ist genau das, was wir gebraucht haben. Beim Les, wir werden Euch nicht enttäuschen!"
languages.original_text: {n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei deinen Worten strahlen die Arbitratoren, die bereits eine beträchtliche Präsenz hatten, noch mehr Gefahr aus. Der Proktor schlägt sich mit seiner Faust gegen die Brust.{/n} "Eine Ansprache von einem erfahrenen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Kommissar{/d} ist genau das, was wir gebraucht haben. Beim Les, wir werden Euch nicht enttäuschen!"

languages.text: {n}À vos propos, les formidables arbitrators semblent émettre une aura véritablement menaçante. Le proctor se frappe la poitrine du poing.{/n} « Nous avions besoin du discours d'{mf|un|une} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}commissaire{/d} {mf|aguerri|aguerrie}. Nous jurons sur la Lex que nous ne vous décevrons pas ! »
languages.original_text: {n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}À vos propos, les formidables arbitrators semblent émettre une aura véritablement menaçante. Le proctor se frappe la poitrine du poing.{/n} « Nous avions besoin du discours d'{mf|un|une} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}commissaire{/d} {mf|aguerri|aguerrie}. Nous jurons sur la Lex que nous ne vous décevrons pas ! »

languages.text: {n}听了你的一席话，本就令人望而生畏的法务官散发出了危险的气息。索罗蒙握紧了拳头，捶着胸口。{/n}“我们正需要一位经验丰富的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}政委{/d}鼓舞士气。帝国律法在上，我们绝不会让你失望！”
languages.original_text: {n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}听了你的一席话，本就令人望而生畏的法务官散发出了危险的气息。索罗蒙握紧了拳头，捶着胸口。{/n}“我们正需要一位经验丰富的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}政委{/d}鼓舞士气。帝国律法在上，我们绝不会让你失望！”

languages.text: {n}Ante tus palabras, los Arbitrator, cuya presencia ya era formidable, empiezan a irradiar peligro. El Procurador se golpea el pecho con el puño.{/n} «El discurso de un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Comisari{mf|o|a}{/d} veteran{mf|o|a} es exactamente lo que necesitábamos. ¡Por la Lex, no le fallaremos!».
languages.original_text: {n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ante tus palabras, los Arbitrator, cuya presencia ya era formidable, empiezan a irradiar peligro. El Procurador se golpea el pecho con el puño.{/n} «El discurso de un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Comisari{mf|o|a}{/d} veteran{mf|o|a} es exactamente lo que necesitábamos. ¡Por la Lex, no le fallaremos!».

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉に、すでに威圧感を放っていたアービトレイターたちの存在が、さらに危険な気配を帯びはじめる。代理人は拳で自らの胸を打ち鳴らした。{/n}「歴戦の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}コミッサー{/d}からの激励こそ、私たちに必要だったものです。レックスに誓って、あなたを失望させることはありません！」
languages.original_text: {n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉に、すでに威圧感を放っていたアービトレイターたちの存在が、さらに危険な気配を帯びはじめる。代理人は拳で自らの胸を打ち鳴らした。{/n}「歴戦の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}コミッサー{/d}からの激励こそ、私たちに必要だったものです。レックスに誓って、あなたを失望させることはありません！」

languages.text: {n}Hâlihazırda oldukça heybetli duran Yargıcılar, senin sözlerinle birlikte iyice tehlikeli bir havaya bürünüyor. Üsteğmen, yumruğunu göğsüne vurarak cevap veriyor.{/n} "Deneyimli bir {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Komiserin{/d} konuşması, tam da ihtiyacımız olan şeydi. Lex şahidim olsun ki sizi yüzüstü bırakmayacağız!"
languages.original_text: {n}At your words, the Arbitrators, whose presence was already formidable, begin to radiate danger. The Proctor strikes his chest with his fist.{/n} "A speech from a seasoned {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Commissar{/d} is exactly what we needed. By the Lex, we will not fail you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hâlihazırda oldukça heybetli duran Yargıcılar, senin sözlerinle birlikte iyice tehlikeli bir havaya bürünürler. Üsteğmen, yumruğunu göğsüne vurarak cevaplar:{/n} "Deneyimli bir {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Komiserin{/d} konuşması tam da ihtiyacımız olan şeydi. Lex şahidim olsun ki sizi yüzüstü bırakmayacağız!"
